_getPluginForFunction(bytes4).details: View address of the plugged-in functionality contract for a given function signature.

getAllFunctionsOfPlugin(address).details: View all funtionality as list of function signatures.

getAllPlugins().details: View all funtionality existing on the contract.

getPluginForFunction(bytes4).details: View address of the plugged-in functionality contract for a given function signature.

multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

params.data: The bytes data that makes up the batch of function calls to execute.

returns.results: The bytes data that makes up the result of the batch of function calls executed.

removePlugin(bytes4).details: Remove existing functionality from the contract.

multicall(bytes[]).notice: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.
